mapper.sql: CTId, CTUseItem, CTCheckProgram, CTName, CTProducer, CTProductionNum, CTNorms, CTProcision, CTResolation, CTAssetNum, CTUseLine, CTUseStation, CTUseTime, CTCheckWay, CTCheckCycle, CTMSA, CTOriginalNum, CTSize, CTCheckTemperature, CTCheckHumidiry,CTReceiver,CTRemark,CTStatus
mapper.select: SELECT CTCheckCycle FROM checkingtools WHERE CTId=(SELECT CTId FROM checkingtoolsrecord WHERE CTRId=#{ctrid,jdbcType=INTEGER});
SELECT CTCheckCycle FROM checkingtools WHERE CTId=#{ctid,jdbcType=INTEGER};
SELECT ct.*,ctr.CTRCheckNextTime FROM checkingtools ct LEFT JOIN checkingtoolsrecord ctr ON ct.CTId=ctr.CTId WHERE ct.CTId=#{ctid,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY CTRCheckNextTime DESC LIMIT 1;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM checkingtools WHERE CTStatus=0 AND CTId=#{CTId,jdbcType=INTEGER};
mapper.insert: insert into checkingtools (CTId, CTUseItem, CTCheckProgram, CTName, CTProducer, CTProductionNum, CTNorms, CTProcision, CTResolation, CTAssetNum, CTUseLine, CTUseStation, CTUseTime, CTCheckWay, CTCheckCycle, CTMSA, CTOriginalNum, CTSize, CTCheckTemperature, CTCheckHumidiry, CTReceiver,CTRemark,CTStatus) values (#{ctid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ctuseitem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctcheckprogram,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctproducer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctproductionnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctnorms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctprocision,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctresolation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctassetnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctuseline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctusestation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctusetime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{ctcheckway,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ctcheckcycle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ctmsa,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ctoriginalnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctsize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ctchecktemperature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctcheckhumidiry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctreceiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ctstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update checkingtools
CTUseItem = #{ctuseitem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTCheckProgram = #{ctcheckprogram,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTName = #{ctname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTProducer = #{ctproducer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTProductionNum = #{ctproductionnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTNorms = #{ctnorms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTProcision = #{ctprocision,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTResolation = #{ctresolation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTAssetNum = #{ctassetnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTUseLine = #{ctuseline,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTUseStation = #{ctusestation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTUseTime = #{ctusetime,jdbcType=DATE},
CTCheckWay = #{ctcheckway,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CTCheckCycle = #{ctcheckcycle,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CTMSA = #{ctmsa,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CTOriginalNum = #{ctoriginalnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTSize = #{ctsize,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CTCheckTemperature = #{ctchecktemperature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTCheckHumidiry = #{ctcheckhumidiry,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTReceiver = #{ctreceiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTRemark = #{ctremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTStatus = #{ctstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where CTId = #{ctid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update checkingtools set CTUseItem = #{ctuseitem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTCheckProgram = #{ctcheckprogram,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTName = #{ctname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTProducer = #{ctproducer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTProductionNum = #{ctproductionnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTNorms = #{ctnorms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTProcision = #{ctprocision,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTResolation = #{ctresolation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTAssetNum = #{ctassetnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTUseLine = #{ctuseline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTUseStation = #{ctusestation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTUseTime = #{ctusetime,jdbcType=DATE}, CTCheckWay = #{ctcheckway,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CTCheckCycle = #{ctcheckcycle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CTMSA = #{ctmsa,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CTOriginalNum = #{ctoriginalnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTSize = #{ctsize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CTCheckTemperature = #{ctchecktemperature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTCheckHumidiry = #{ctcheckhumidiry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTReceiver = #{ctreceiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR} CTRemark = #{ctremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} CTStatus = #{ctstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where CTId = #{ctid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
UPDATE checkingtools SET CTStatus=1 WHERE CTId=#{ctid,jdbcType=INTEGER};
UPDATE checkingtools SET CTStatus=#{ctstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE CTId=#{ctid,jdbcType=INTEGER};
UPDATE checkingtools SET CTReceiver=#{ctreceiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE CTId=#{ctid,jdbcType=INTEGER};
